titleStmt.title: Poor Robins Character of France, or, France painted to the life in a brief dialogue of the description of that nation, their manners, customs, complements, language, discourse &c. : as also, an exact character of the city of Paris, of their gentry, peasants, women &c. / by Poor Robin ...
titleStmt.author: Poor Robin.
Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

notesStmt.note: "Attributable to Winstanley or his imitators"--cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
